title: Ingame bugged

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body: So, I just disconnected from a league of legends ranked game I was about to win. As I close my game to try to reconnect, I come back to no option to do so, and am able to start another game. Yet the game does not show up in my match history, and apparently, op.gg says I am still in-game. The same with everyone on my team. Can I get someone to shed some light on this situation? I believe I just got bugged out of my first promotion series victory...

replies.body: Ahhhhh this is pretty rare, but that game sounds like it actually crashed on the server side of things instead of you just disconnecting from it. You weren't able to rejoin since it crashes altogether, which is why Jaevon was in a new game as well. No worries, when this happens you won't get any punishments and you can requeue as if it never happened.
Apparently, Jaevon now shows up in another game, while some of my teammates still show up in the last one that is non-existent
